TopicTitle: Target box indicator not showing up

Articles.Content:
I noticed that the people that bought ksp enhanced edition with the new update that they see the green/yellow target box when you have a vessel targeted. I thought I had to just make another world with the new update but that wasn’t the case. Pls fix this i bought the game before 1.4. My friend bought it today when I noticed that he had the box indicators. I made a new world but still no result. It makes rendezvous so much easier.

Edited April 1, 2019 by Mrblubbernugget

On 4/1/2019 at 4:05 PM, Mrblubbernugget said:

I noticed that the people that bought ksp enhanced edition with the new update that they see the green/yellow target box when you have a vessel targeted. I thought I had to just make another world with the new update but that wasn’t the case. Pls fix this i bought the game before 1.4. My friend bought it today when I noticed that he had the box indicators. I made a new world but still no result. It makes rendezvous so much easier.

Check your settings options for "enable target marker" or something like that.
Tnx a lot you Made My day :)
